gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 128, Grizzlies 119
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Grizzlies, 128-119. Paul George recorded 37 points (7-10 3PM) and three rebounds for the Clippers, with Kawhi Leonard adding 22 points, seven rebounds, and four assists in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 21 points and six rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 25-13 in the regular season, while the Grizzlies fall to 14-24.
